Text: Previews are kinda depressing.  Why would such a beautiful girl chop her hair off like that? :(  Thanks again for your amazing and prolific posts bestsec.  They're always super appreciated!
I think she's wearing a wig in the sets where her hair is longer.
Ah ok.  She should grow her hair out that length then.  She looks way nicer like that. :)
Ah well, doesn't matter.  Thanks again for the great up!
